name: Andson Biotech
headline: Empowering Mass Spec for Biotech and Beyond
description: Andson Biotech helps pharmaceutical companies measure difficult to detect chemicals that they need to measure while developing and manufacturing drugs like cell-therapies or biologics. Drug companies want to use our technologies to get fast and accurate chemical measurements they do thousands of times per day for drug development and quality control.

founders.name: Mason Chilmonczyk, Founder
founders.description: Mason is the co-founder and CEO of Andson Biotech, an academic spinout based on Mason's research at the Georgia Institute of Technology. At Andson, Mason is driving the company's mission to develop novel methodologies for advanced biomanufacturing discovery and monitoring. Mason is formally trained as a mechanical engineer with a BS from the University of South Florida ('14) and an MS and PhD from Georgia Tech ('17, '20).

# Empowering Mass Spec
## Rapid Sample Prep
[Product Platform](http://www.andsonbiotech.com/</platform>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff97f2d6c09950bc3efc36/663aa00a2f484f47487cadf1_CGPT%20Blue%20Cells%20V1.png)
## Advanced BiotherapiesDemand Advanced Biotools
# The Promise
Modern biotherapeutics are revolutionizing medicine with novel cellular and genetic therapies for previously untreatable diseases like cancer, genetic disorders, and autoimmune conditions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff97f2d6c09950bc3efc36/6643e5f6dbce9d8078d9166e_Website%20Images%20Drafts%20\(24\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff97f2d6c09950bc3efc36/66439a672d0b5c1dff37edfc_Untitled%20design%20\(1\).png)
# The Challenge
Advanced analytical tools are needed to decipher the structural and functional complexities inherent to modern biotherapeutic discovery, development and manufacturing.
## Mass Spec Holds the Key
# The Gold Standard
With an unmatched combination of accuracy, sensitivity and resolution, mass spectrometry is widely recognized as the gold standard in characterizing complex biological samples.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff97f2d6c09950bc3efc36/66439666752446328f38f990_Mass%20Spectra%20Graph%20and%20mAb%20Protein%20Illustration%20Image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff97f2d6c09950bc3efc36/6643fcbeb49184d62b74eef7_Bioanalytics.png)
# The Bottleneck
With low-throughput sample prep on the front end, and limited bioanalytical insights on the back-end, mass spec workflows are frustratingly complex, inefficient and tedious.
## Andson's Solution:
## Sample Prep in Seconds,Mass Spec in Minutes
# DynaCHIP
1-Second Sample Prep**DynaCHIP** packages advanced microfluidics into an easy-to-use system and drops into existing mass spec workflows to enable 1-second sample prep for exponentially faster results.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ff97f2d6c09950bc3efc36/664e3da6eeecbb73bfd71b1e_Untitled%20design%20\(7\).png)
## Andson Biotech Unlocks thePromise of Modern Biotherapeutics
01
Accelerate and simplify "common" analytical measurements carried out by conventional mass spec workflows.
02
Develop better, faster assays to streamline drug discovery and get advanced therapies to market faster.
03
Reduce time and costs with high throughput bioanalytics and dynamic feedback control.
Our tools simplify and optimize mass spec workflows, help drive down manufacturing costs, reduce drug development timelines and enable new drug processes by directly measuring what matters for these modern bioprocesses. 
## Contact us today to learn how DynaCHIPcan simplify and accelerate your mass spec workflows
[Contact Us](http://www.andsonbiotech.com/</contact-information-form>)

generated_description:
### Andson Biotech: Revolutionizing Drug Development Through Advanced Mass Spectrometry

**Mission:** Empowering Mass Spec for Biotech and Beyond.

**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** Atlanta, GA  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W22

---

Andson Biotech emerged with a clear purpose: to empower pharmaceutical companies in their quest for precision by making mass spectrometry faster and more efficient. Their core technology helps drug developers measure challenging chemicals essential in creating innovative therapies, including cell therapies and biologics. This is crucial for quality control and drug development, where accuracy and speed are paramount.

### The Challenge

Modern biotherapeutics—think cutting-edge treatments for diseases like cancer and genetic disorders—demand sophisticated analytical tools. As it stands, mass spectrometry (mass spec) has long been the gold standard for characterizing complex biological samples, thanks to its unique combination of accuracy, sensitivity, and resolution. However, existing workflows often fall short due to low-throughput sample preparation and limited analytical insights, creating a bottleneck in the drug development process.

### Andson's Solution: DynaCHIP

Enter **DynaCHIP**, Andson Biotech's innovative system designed to streamline mass spectrometry workflows. By incorporating advanced microfluidics, DynaCHIP reduces sample preparation to a mere second, drastically accelerating the entire mass spec process. This allows drug developers to obtain rapid results that were previously unattainable—cutting down on both time and costs while enhancing the reliability of drug metrics.

### Simplifying Biotherapeutic Development

Andson Biotech focuses on three key areas: 

1. **Accelerate and Simplify Measurements:** By optimizing conventional mass spec workflows, they help researchers get the insights they need more efficiently.
   
2. **Improve Assays for Drug Discovery:** DynaCHIP facilitates the creation of better, faster assays, helping bring advanced therapies to market quickly.
   
3. **High-Throughput Bioanalytics:** Their technology not only reduces costs and timelines but also allows for dynamic feedback control throughout the bioprocess.

### Conclusion

With a forward-thinking approach and a commitment to supporting modern biotherapeutics, Andson Biotech is set to redefine the analytical landscape for drug development. By simplifying processes that traditionally have been cumbersome, they’re enabling pharmaceutical companies to focus on what truly matters—the development of life-changing therapies.

For more information on how Andson Biotech can streamline your mass spec workflows, visit their website: [Andson Biotech](http://www.andsonbiotech.com).
